About

Interactive Table

An interactive table commissioned by the milanese Ordine degli Architetti di Milano - Order of Architects PPC of the province of Milan to complement a photographic exhibition on the contemporary architectural landscape of Milan.

Year: 2015

Client: Ordine degli Architetti di Milano, Opendot

Team: Alessandro Masserdotti, Andreji Boleslavsky, Ambhika Samsen, Michele Ferretti


View Project Site
